definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The paper money is for the deceased to use in the afterlife.
sentences.chinese: 这句话不对吧烧纸钱怎么是给他们下辈子用呢？

sentences.english: If I still remember you in my next life, I will die without you.
sentences.chinese: 下辈子如果我还记得你，我死都不和你在一起。

sentences.english: My next life I want your heart, at least I do not jump you have to die.
sentences.chinese: 缪下辈子我要做你的心脏，至少我不跳你就得死。

sentences.english: Next life I want to be your heart, at least I don't jump you have to die.
sentences.chinese: 下辈子我要做你的心脏，至少我不跳你就得死。

sentences.english: If there is reincarnation life, my next life, I would like to be a swan.
sentences.chinese: 如果生命真有轮回，下辈子，我愿是一只天鹅。

sentences.english: If I win the lottery, I will be set up for life.
sentences.chinese: 假设我中彩票了，我下辈子就衣食无忧了。

sentences.english: The next generation is only comforts to own one kind.
sentences.chinese: 下辈子只是自己对自己的一种宽慰罢了。

sentences.english: If you can not be with you in this life, next life could marry you?
sentences.chinese: 如果这辈子不能和你在一起，下辈子可以嫁给你吗？

sentences.english: I want to be your heart, I don't jump, you will die.
sentences.chinese: 下辈子我要做你的心脏，我不跳，你就必死无疑。

sentences.english: My love , I want to be your lover in the next life , too .
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，希望下辈子我也当你的爱人。

sentences.english: Only if you are Chris next life, I will still be a corn.
sentences.chinese: 只要你下辈子还是李宇春，那我还是玉米。

sentences.english: If you can, the next gerneration I still love you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能，下辈子我依然爱你。

sentences.english: You want to come back as a coffee mug in your next life.
sentences.chinese: 你希望自己下辈子是一个咖啡杯。

definition: to play tricks/to cheat/to get up to mischief/to become a ghost/to give up the ghost
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
lit. to work like an ox, to work like a horse; fig. to work extremely hard
to end one's suffering by dying quickly and being reincarnated/(fig.) to get it over with
to die without progeny/(offensive) may you die childless/may you be the last of your family line
